errNoStations: Please fill in a departure and arrival station
errNoDays: Please select a day of the week
errWrongStations: Stations should be chosen from the list
fillEntireSearchForm: Please fill in the entire search form
changeTime: Average time for a platform change
missedConnections: Chance of missing connections due to delays
delay_tooltip: Maximum amount of minutes that you consider an acceptable delay. Any amount above your preference will reduce the trip score.
amountOfChanges_tooltip: Average amount of times you need to change vehicle. Any amount above your preference will reduce the trip score.
delayConsistency_tooltip: Minimum consistency you expect for delays. Anomalies will reduce trip score.
changeTime_tooltip: Average time spent waiting when you need to change vehicles. Any amount above your preference will reduce the trip score.
avgTravelTime_tooltip: Average time between departure and arrival.
missedConnections_tooltip: The average chance that you are willing to risk missing the change of train.
prefExplenation: The following options determine how much each variable is counted when calculating your tripscore. The more important you designate an item, the heavier it will weigh in the final score.
errStationServer: Stations are not in the same region/country
references: Learn more about the project on
